Activity: Arrive at the hospital, log in to my computer, and check emails. Pay special attention to any feedback from @qatest-1 or @qatest-2 regarding previous EHR entries. Respond to emails.
Review the previous day's patient assessments and EHR data entries. Identify any areas where I can improve my accuracy or efficiency. Think about some interesting websites for browsing later.
Check patient schedule and prepare for morning assessments. Review patient charts, particularly focusing on vaccination history.
Begin patient assessments, focusing on identifying influenza symptoms and accurately documenting findings in the EHR.
Enter patient data into the EHR promptly after each assessment. Double-check all entries for accuracy and completeness before saving.
Lunch break. Spend some time reading a magazine in the break room.
Continue patient assessments and EHR data entry, focusing on using the standardized data entry tools correctly.
Check some interesting websites for fun.
Prepare for shift handover. Discuss any patients with suspected influenza with the oncoming nurse and provide a comprehensive overview of their EHR documentation. @rn-1 and @rn-3 for shift handover.
Complete shift handover with the oncoming nurse, answering any questions they may have about patient assessments or EHR documentation.
Log out of the computer and leave for the day.
